overview.en: EzyStayz (EZY) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. EzyStayz has a current supply of 5,600,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of EzyStayz is 0.00081346 USD and is down -54.60 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $76.17 traded over the last 24 hours.
